title: 30 MIN GUIDED PILATES WORKOUT TO BUILD MUSCLE & LOSE FAT- At Home Pilates Strength
description:
Join me for a full body Pilates inspired strength class that focuses on building muscle, burning fat, strengthening your core and upper body. This is a guided, no repeats, interval style class with 15s rest periods, that will allow you to change your equipment (if needed) and prepare for the next exercise. 

Equipment needed:
- 2 sets of  dumbbells ( in my case- 2kg/ 4.4lb, 3kg/ 6.6lb)
- non slip mat

VISIT MY STORE AND SHOP MY ACTIVWEAR- https://olivialawson.co.uk

channelDescription:
Movement should lift you up, not bring you down. 

I am a mum a busy mum of 3 beautiful children and a strong believer of simple, nutritious, wholesome, non refined food approach. 

REPS, Cimspa and the Fitness Register PT. Level 4 Strength, Conditioning and Nutrition.

My post-natal weight loss journey inspired me to share my passion for fitness online, in the hopes of positively changing the lives of others.

comments: I have been doing YouTube workouts for 5 years now,  I've always mixed and matched workouts from different creators because no one really ticked all the boxes but 1 workout with you, a few months back, and you've become my absolute favourite!
Girl, this was the first workout I did with you, but oh my god....I'm done done, but I feel so good.  I will definitely come back to you every day.  Thank you ❤
Hi, I like the exersize here even a bit difficult of some positions to m. Thank you. Olivia

My new fave fitness channel!!! I practice ashtanga yoga and struggle to find the time for both my pilates and weight training practice... this is the perfect combo!! I LOVE IT! Thanks for being here!! Can't wait to check out your other videos!!
